text:
Most macro love NKY, willing to love it more. Bringing it home; fast macro money players are rushing to erase
losses, year long pains through wider rates, longer USD, weaker EM, stronger equities.

Real Money is in defensive, remembering Taper Tantrum days, fearing institutional outflows & forced selling
of carry hope positions.

Those who want to "fade" Trump rally, seek valuation in EM, believe core rates can tighten to get a breather are
in Minority.
